series_description: This series documents the registration and annual renewal of registration by securities agents through State Corporation Commission(SCC). This series may include, but is not limited to:Notice of Acceptance of registration, Uniform Applications for Securities and Commodities Representative and/or Agent, supplemental documentation, and correspondence
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after termination or expiration of registration then destroy.

series_description: This series documents complaints and investigations of broker/dealers and registered agents for compliance with or violations of the securities act. This series may include, but is not limited to:customer complaint letters and responses, examinations, audit working papers, broker/dealer account documentation, SCC orders, customer monthly statements, and correspondence.
retention_statement: Retain 4 years after closure of complaint or investigation then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the registration and annual renewal of registration by securities broker/dealers that remain active until termination of registration. This series may include, but is not limited to:broker/dealer withdrawal form, broker/dealer questionnaire, broker/dealer license renewal application, copies of clearance letters, and other correspondence
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after renewal, termination, or cancellation of registration then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of disclosure documents of franchise companies whose registrations have expired under the Retail Franchising Act
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after close of calender year of expiration then destroy in compliance with No.8 on schedule cover page.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia 13.1-557 et seq. This series may include, but is not limited to: comment letters, forms, disclosure files, and correspondence.

series_title: Securities and Retail Franchising Investigation Files
series_description: This series documents the investigation of suspected violations of the Securities Act 13. 1-501 et seq. of the
retention_statement: Retain 6 years after closure of investigation then destroy in compliance with No.8 on schedule cover page.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia and the Retail Franchising Act 13.1-557 et seq. These investigations may result from investigative surveillance, individual complaints or notification by other government agencies of possible violations. This series may include, but is not limited to: subpoenaed financial information provided by banks to SCC, information provided from the subjects of SCC investigations (some in CD format), analyses, and correspondence. Code of Virginia 13.1-518, 13.1-567 and VAC 5-100-10.

series_description: This series documents the exemptions of securities registration listed under the
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after becoming inactive then destroy.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, 13.1-514, exemptions requested and ordered by the Commission (SCC), and verifications of the exemptions. This series may include, but is not limited to:a prospectus, copy of commission's order
